actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that a recipient of disability insurance benefits under title II of such act must wait for 24 months before becoming eligible for coverage under medicare.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement that a recipient of disability insurance benefits under title II (Old-Aged, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act must wait for 24 months before becoming eligible for coverage under medicare.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that a recipient of disability insurance benefits under title II of such act must wait for 24 months before becoming eligible for coverage under medicare.
